title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: A.V.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and blue, pink ink, brush and blue, pink watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: A. V.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Star-shaped monogram comprised of an "A" formed by a vertically divided triangle, one side blue lines, the other solid blue lines, intersecting a similarly formed "V" in pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: A.V.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and blue, pink ink, brush and blue, pink watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-105.
